"Inquiry", "isDefault": true}, {"type": "gatewayParallel", "center": {"x": 620, "y": 160}, "id": "parallel_notify", "text": "Send Notifications"}, {"startId": "assign_branch", "endId": "parallel_notify", "type": "flow"}, {"startId": "assign_service", "endId": "parallel_notify", "type": "flow"}, {"startId": "assign_complaint", "endId": "parallel_notify", "type": "flow"}, {"startId": {"startId": "parallel_notify", "endId": "send_sms", "type": "flow"}, {"type": "gatewayParallel", "center": {"x": 900, "y": 160}, "id": "parallel_join", "text": "Join"}, {"startId": "send_email", "endId": "parallel_join", "type": "flow"}, {"startId": "send_sms", "endId": "parallel_join", "type": "flow"}, {"type": "task", "center": {"x": 1040, "y": 160}, "id": "update_status", "text": "Update Status to\\nIn Progress", "actionList": [{"type": "updateEntity", "fields": {"status": {"subjectType": "value", "attributes": {"status": "In Progress"}}}}]}, {"startId": "parallel_join", "endId": "update_status", "type": "flow"}, {"type": "eventEnd", "center": {"x": 1180, "y": 160}, "id": "end"}, {"startId": "update_status", "endId": "end", "type": "flow"}]}
description:
Automatically assigns cases based on branch or category and sends acknowledgments.

ASSIGNMENT LOGIC:
1. If Branch selected → Assign to Branch Team (Round-Robin)
2. If No Branch:
   - Service → Customer Service Team (Round-Robin)
   - Complaint → Complaints Team (Least-Busy)
   - Inquiry → Inquiry Team (Round-Robin)

NOTIFICATIONS:
- Email acknowledgment to customer
- SMS notification to customer  
- Status updated to "In Progress"

TRIGGER: Case created with status = "Open"

name: Case: Status Change Handling
data: {"list": [{"type": "eventStartConditional", "center": {"x": 60, "y": 160}, "triggerType": "afterRecordUpdated", "isInterrupting": false, "id": "start_status_change", "text": "Status Changed", "conditionsAll": [{"type": "all", "comparison": "wasEqual", "fieldToCompare": "status", "value": "Open", "not": true}]}, {"type": "gatewayExclusive", "center": {"x": 200, "y": 160}, "id": "check_new_status", "text": "New Status?", "flowList": [{"id": "flow_escalated", "conditionsAll": [{"type": "all", "comparison": "equals", "fieldToCompare": "status", "value": "Escalated"}]}, {"id": "flow_resolved", "conditionsAll": [{"type": "all", "comparison": "equals", "fieldToCompare": "status", "value": "Resolved"}]}, {"id": "flow_closed", "conditionsAll": [{"type": "all", "comparison": "equals", "fieldToCompare": "status", "value": "Closed"}]}], "defaultFlowId": "flow_other"}, {"startId": "start_status_change", "endId": "check_new_status", "type": "flow"}, {"type": "task", "center": {"x": 340, "y": 60}, "id": "escalate_supervisor", "text": "Reassign to Supervisor", "actionList": [{"type": "updateEntity", "formula": "$userId = entity\\\\attribute('assignedUserId');\\n$supervisor = record\\\\attribute('User', $userId, 'superiorId');\\nif($supervisor) {\\n  entity\\\\setAttribute('assignedUserId', $supervisor);\\n}"}]}, {"startId": "check_new_status", "endId": "escalate_supervisor", "id": "flow_escalated", "type": "flow", "text": "Escalated"}, {"type": "taskSendMessage", "center": {"x": 480, "y": 60}, "id": "notify_supervisor", "text": "Notify Supervisor", "messageType": "Email", "from": "system", "to": "targetEntity.assignedUser"}, {"startId": "escalate_supervisor", "endId": "notify_supervisor", "type": "flow"}, {"type": "task", "center": {"x": 340, "y": 160}, "id": "record_resolution", "text": "Record Resolution Time", "actionList": [{"type": "updateEntity", "formula": "$now = datetime\\\\now();\\nentity\\\\setAttribute('cResolvedAt', $now);"}]}, {"startId": "check_new_status", "endId": "record_resolution", "id": "flow_resolved", "type": "flow", "text": "Resolved"}, {"type": "taskSendMessage", "center": {"x": 480, "y": 160}, "id": "send_resolution", "text": "Send Resolution Email", "messageType": "Email", "from": "system", "to": "targetEntity.contact"}, {"startId": "record_resolution", "endId": "send_resolution", "type": "flow"}, {"type": "eventIntermediateTimerCatch", "center": {"x": 620, "y": 160}, "timerShift": 7, "timerShiftUnits": "days", "timerShiftOperator": "plus", "id": "wait_7days", "text": "Wait 7 Days"}, {"startId": "send_resolution", "endId": "wait_7days", "type": "flow"}, {"type": "task", "center": {"x": 760, "y": 160}, "id": "auto_close", "text": "Auto-Close Case", "actionList": [{"type": "updateEntity", "fields": {"status": {"subjectType": "value", "attributes": {"status": "Closed"}}}}]}, {"startId": "wait_7days", "endId": "auto_close", "type": "flow"}, {"type": "taskSendMessage", "center": {"x": 340, "y": 260}, "id": "send_closure", "text": "Send Closure Email", "messageType": "Email", "from": "system", "to": "targetEntity.contact"}, {"startId": "check_new_status", "endId": "send_closure", "id": "flow_closed", "type": "flow", "text": "Closed"}, {"type": "eventEnd", "center": {"x": 900, "y": 160}, "id": "end"}, {"startId": "notify_supervisor", "endId": "end", "type": "flow"}, {"startId": "auto_close", "endId": "end", "type": "flow"}, {"startId": "send_closure", "endId": "end", "type": "flow"}, {"startId": "check_new_status", "endId": "end", "id": "flow_other", "type": "flow", "text": "Other", "isDefault": true}]}
description:
Handles all case status changes with appropriate actions.

STATUS TRANSITIONS:
- Escalated → Reassign to supervisor + notify
- Resolved → Send resolution email + wait 7 days + auto-close
- Closed → Send closure notification

TRIGGER: Status field changed

name: Case: Priority Alert System

description:
Sends immediate alerts for high and urgent priority cases.

ALERT LEVELS:
- Urgent: Email + SMS to assigned officer + team lead
- High: Email to assigned officer + team lead

TRIGGER: Case created with priority = High or Urgent
